title: Actor & Pervert
description:
Description :
        Seven years ago, Kitae met actor Shinwoo by chance and became obsessed. After years of stalking him, Kitae wins the lottery and plans to kidnap Shinwoo with the money. He hides his real identity and gets a job as Shinwoo’s manager. As he gradually gets closer to kidnapping him…
“Did you think I wouldn’t know, Byeon Kitae?”
